suppress.notes:
File name: elasticsearch-6.5.4.jar
This vulnerability is related clusters that configure xpack.security.dls_fls.enabled to false. This option is set to true by default and we do not override that setting anywhere. See the link for reference: https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/6.5/security-settings.html#field-document-security-settings
AO: We'd need to upgrade our elasticsearch services in order to upgrade this too.

file name: kotlin-reflect-1.3.10.jar
AO: This jar has been updated in our dependency file.

File name: spring-security-*.jar in combination with Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE
Affects Spring Framework 5.0.5.RELEASE only. AO: However it still flags a false positive with a newer release (5.1.6.RELEASE) So we'll need to leave it here for now.

file name: grpc-netty-shaded-1.23.0.jar
AO: This is bought in from the event-bus dependency.

file name: event-bus-1.32.2.jar (shaded: io.netty:netty-tcnative-boringssl-static:2.0.22.Final)
AO: This is bought in from the event-bus dependency.

file name: jackson-databind-2.9.10.jar
AO: https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2478 They indicate a fix should be issued around the 19th october
